channel.title: Run update timer automatically
channel.description:
How can i make my server do ::update 60 automatically every 89 minutes, i'm trying to do this so it saves all the accounts before the auto restarter restarts
I am using PI if it makes any difference.
could someone please help my users are getting annoyed with rollbacks, also i have tried using a shutdown hook, that didnt help
